info.name: Turnip's Terrible Theme
info.description: A kitsu.io dark theme designed to not burn people's eyes in the morning. It's currently the most popular Kitsu.io Theme.
info.additionalInfo:
This stylesheet was released on Dec 16th, 2016.

http://tinyurl.com/TTTurnip <- Shorten link to my theme.

UPDATE NOVEMBER 2019 
LOL

Update December 28th 2018
----
 : Made the user stats white.

Update June 11th 2018
----
 : Made library buttons less bright
 : Made the main text more bright 

Update June 9th 2018
----
 : fixed buttons on advanced search
 : made feed wider
 : changed character images to cover not stretch/fill
 : made deleted users have a picture instead of a broken image

Update March 13th 2018
----
 : removed one last bit of white, thanks fukuchi^
 : made my avatar square.


Update March 12th 2018
----
 : Added deleted users placeholder
 : removed more white
 : whited some hard to read text
 : changed the menu hover from 151515 to 252525

Update Jan 20th 2018
----
 : Updated css to be the same as my theme
   It was basically a rewrite.

Update Mar 15th 2017
----
: Temporarily whitened canny powered stuff (feedback)
: Groups have been darkened


Update Feb 14th 2017
----
: Made new spoiler button
: Made new reply comment buttons
: Removed borders
: Applied style to trending media-tooltip
: Various other smaller edits

Update Feb 9th 2017
----
: Fixed duplicate
: Gave sidebar ads more top spacing, less bottom spacing.
: Removed some obsolete css fixes that Josh ended up fixing. 


Update Jan 31st 2017
----
: Styled anime ratings and rating change on anime pages.
: Restyled search and settings page again. Little less ugly now.
: Added minor fix with character images being different heights.
: changed loading animation slightly
: stylised twitter oneboxs (embeds)

Update Jan 20th 2017
----
: Added tinyurl for ease of linking.
: Changed and darkened Trending page.
: Fixed reviews on trending page (no longer different sizes or break styling when width<170px)
: Removed gradient due to scrolling issues.
: Darkened font on genre tags on anime pages.
: Changed favourite tabs to be a little more like original now that the site's css is fixed.


Update Jan 16th 2017
----
: Fixed favourite panel again
: Commented and sorted css a little more. (not a lot more though :p)
: Finally removed the transparent section quick update background.
: Added minor easter egg.
